```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
PokeGo_water2water <- read.csv(file = "https://github.com/hcnureth/Capstone-Project/blob/master/Capstone%20Project%20Data%20Wrangling/PokeGo_water2water.csv")
ggplot(PokeGo_water2water, aes(closeToWater, fill = closeToWater)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(x = "Close to Water", y = "Appearances of Water Type Pokemon",
       fill = "Close To Water")
```
